mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_logininfo (username, phone, email, password, type, disable, salt, uid) VALUES ( #{username}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{password}, #{type}, #{disable}, #{salt}, #{uid} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_logininfo WHERE (username = #{username} OR email = #{username} OR phone = #{username}) AND disable = 1
SELECT * FROM t_logininfo WHERE uid=#{id} AND disable = 1
